description: “He’s been accused of stealing from a dog,” Kimmel said of the congressman on Wednesday.
title: Jimmy Kimmel: George Santos Is a ‘Scooby-Doo’ Villain
title_page: Jimmy Kimmel: George Santos Is a ‘Scooby-Doo’ Villain - The New York Times
maintext:
Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night’s highlights that lets you sleep — and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.
By Any Other Name
George Santos’s former roommate appeared on CNN this week after reports that the New York congressman had kept money raised on GoFundMe meant to help a veteran with a sick dog, and that he went by other names, such as Anthony Devolder.
On Wednesday, Jimmy Kimmel said that it’s “always a bad sign when your former roommate is on CNN.”
